alert.note: Alert for North Central and Southeast Siskiyou County; South Central Siskiyou County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 10 at 3:59PM PST until December 10 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Medford
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST THIS EVENING... ...WINTER STORM WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 4 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Wet snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 3 inches. * WHERE...South Central Siskiyou County, including all areas along I-5 and highway 89, Grass Lake on highway 97 as well as Mt. Shasta City, Dunsmuir, McCloud and Tennant. * WHEN...Until 10 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: * Travel is strongly discouraged because of dangerous conditions. * If you must travel, keep tire chains, a flashlight, blankets, food, water, medications, and a fully charged phone with you. * The safest place during a winter storm is indoors.

area.areaDesc: North Central and Southeast Siskiyou County; South Central Siskiyou County
